snippet: A small but growing niche of the baby-care industry offers not only the latest products, but also education and camaraderie.
abstract: Nicole LaPorte Prototype column observes that a small but growing niche of the baby-care industry offers not only the latest products, but also education and camaraderie; highlights the Pump Station and Nurtury, a breast-feeding resource center and baby boutique in Santa Monica, Calif, which has managed to survive despite domination by megastores and other retailers of the $9.8 billion baby products industry.
lead_paragraph: A small but growing niche of the baby-care industry offers not only the latest products, but also education and camaraderie.

headline.seo: For Breast-Feeding Moms, Stores and More
headline.main: Stores, and More, for Breast-Feeding Moms
headline.print_headline: Stores, and More, for Breast-Feeding Moms
